definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
big/stream or canal/drain/ditch/CL:條|条[tiao2]/him (dialect)/outer rim of a carriage wheel (old)

sentences.english: The people of Linxian Country really did wonders in building the canal.
sentences.chinese: 林縣人民修建這條水渠，的確創造了奇蹟。

sentences.english: They have built canals to irrigate the desert.
sentences.chinese: 他們建造成水渠以灌溉沙漠。

sentences.english: The fetid open drains lining the main street of the town do not smell eco-friendly;
sentences.chinese: 鎮上的水渠散發着惡臭，聞起來似乎並不環境友好。

sentences.english: Provided that no covered drain shall have an internal diameter of less than 100 mm.
sentences.chinese: 但任何暗置排水渠的內徑不得少於100毫米。

sentences.english: Willows are planted on both sides of the streets.
sentences.chinese: 每條水渠旁都種了柳樹和果樹。

sentences.english: It installed in large water channel, along with lift bracket used as closing device.
sentences.chinese: 安裝在大型水渠中，同起吊架一起作爲閉路設備。

sentences.english: Monitoring and protecting measures for a water channel are stated , when the boring of a shield-driven tunnel is under it.
sentences.chinese: 介紹盾構施工穿越水渠時，對水渠的監測和保護措施。

sentences.english: Monitoring and protecting measures for a water channel are stated , when the boring of a shield-driven tunnel is under it.
sentences.chinese: 介紹盾構施工穿越水渠時，對水渠的監測和保護措施。

sentences.english: It's a canal dug by the people of Linzhou. It's called the Red Flag Canal.
sentences.chinese: 水長城說的就是林州人修建的水渠，叫紅旗渠。

sentences.english: This water drains from the condenser, where it enters the hot-well.
sentences.chinese: 從排水渠出來的水進入熱井。
他們在棉田裏挖了水渠。

sentences.english: Yes. You get off at Canal St.
sentences.chinese: 到的，你在水渠街下車便行。

sentences.english: The canal has proved useful to the county in many ways.
sentences.chinese: 這條水渠給這個縣帶來的好處是多方面的。

sentences.english: Rehabilitation (of buildings), e. g. Blue House at Stone Nullah Lane in Wanchai.
sentences.chinese: 維修樓宇，例如灣仔石水渠街的藍屋。

sentences.english: He was a great engineer and built tunnels and aqueducts for the water supply for Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位偉大的工程師，他爲耶路撒冷修築引水渠道。

definition: to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)
